title: (50 Pack) CML Decorator Wall Light Switch, Single Pole Switch, 15A 120/277V, 3-Year Warranty, White

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #37,882 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #137 in Electrical Light Switches       #137 in Electrical Light Switches

availability_status: Only 5 left in stock - order soon.
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: Sturdy impact-resistant polycarbonate construction for residential and commercial use
Terminal screws accept copper or copper-clad wire (up to 12 AWG). Quick push-in terminals accept 14 AWG solid copper wire only

customers_say: Customers find the wall switch easy to install and appreciate its modern look. They like how easy it is to change out, with one customer noting it's a simple upgrade from a flip switch. However, several customers report that the color doesn't match their decor and that the switches don't work properly.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsNice affordable light switches!
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Easy installation, great value for your money, nice appearance and grest quality!

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2025

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsEasy to install. Looks great.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2022
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Easy upgrade from flip switch. Matches plate covers. They look great installed but don’t feel very sturdy but should be ok with normal use. Better value than box store price. Hubby installed without needing an electrician. *Make sure power is off during installation.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Hey, they work. Only 4 stars is because in very tiny print (hard to see) is the word "TOP" engraved in the metal. If you miss it, you'll install the switch incorrectly and have to do it over. I missed several of them.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsCML interruptor de pared (50 unidades)
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Al mudarme de casa, tuvimos que cambiar todos los switches y los tomacorrientes. Estos fueron una buena opcion. Funcionan bien y no son tan costosos.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2024

customer_reviews.rating: 1.0 out of 5 stars1.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.review_title: 1.0 out of 5 starsWorks fine color does not even match their own outlets
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Unless you just want cheap to have cheap do not get these. The color is off from even their own cover plates and has caused us many problems. We just placed on so you can see.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsEasy to change out
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These are easy to change out for a modern feel.
